name: Russian Roulette (itch) (Lord Destro)
description:
Local two player Russian roulette

Future update plans to add an online multiplayer

Controls:

Click Revolver Barrel to open it

Click holes in cylinder to put desired bullets in

Click the cylinder on the gun to spin it

Click the Barrel again to close the revolver

Click the hammer to arm it

Click the trigger to find out your fate

If you open the revolver, you are forced to spin the cylinder

Not opening the revolver after the previous player will give the player bonus money

If the player dies, the bullets are automatically ejected and need to be reloaded.
